ToExpand.Title: programming
ToExpand.Text:
4+ years of experience with C# and .NET Framework.
2+ years of experience with C++11/C++14 and the Standard Library.
1+ years of experience with HTML, CSS and Javascript.

4+ years of experience with 2D game development.
4+ years of experience with desktop application development.

2+ years of experience with SFML and XNA.
1+ years of experience with JSONcpp, cTemplate and LUA.

Basic knowledge of computer science theory concepts.
Ability to learn new languages and libraries quickly.
Ability to refactor, organize and optimize existing code.
Knowledge of common game development algorithms and techniques.

Experience with GNU/Linux and Microsoft Windows as development environments.
Experience with Visual Studio, Eclipse, Code::Blocks, CodeLite, QT Creator, Sublime Text.
Experience with MinGW, GCC, Clang and Boost.


Experience with ASP.NET WebForms, SQL, Linq and .NET-based web development. Experience with team-based development.
